long_description: Boasting light weight, superior ventilation and the security of a polycarbonate reinforcement cage, the Scott Wit-R Bike Helmet offers top-level road performance at a mid-level price. Micro Rotary Adjustment System (Micro R.A.S.) features an easy-to-use dial enabling one-handed fit adjustments, and it incorporates flexible materials for extra comfort. Easily adjustable chin strap dividers provide maximum comfort and correct positioning of the helmet on your head during use. In-Mold technology binds the shell to the helmet's EPS liner, enhances impact-resistance and creates a lightweight helmet. Scott Wit-R Bike Helmet has 25 vents. Adheres to CPSC standards. Closeout.
